nodes.text: That's the first dinner bell! If I leave now, I shouldn't be late for supper.

nodes.message: Needed to prevent Shawn from skipping key plot events.
Needed to prevent Shawn from skipping key plot events.

nodes.text: I'm starting to get hungry from the smell of all that good food cooking in the kitchen. Good thing it's almost suppertime.
That's the early dinner bell! It's about time to go to the dining hall.
It's almost time for dinner! I'd better get there before the food's all gone.
Yes. It's almost that special time of day for friends and food.
My stomach's starting to growl. Better hurry off to the dining hall sometime soon.
Suppertime... my favorite time of day.
For whom the bell tolls - it tolls for me - time for tea!
It's getting close to suppertime now.
Is it that time already? Gotta go get the grub soon.
Food, glorious food... almost time to get to the dining hall.
The early dinner bell! - food is definitely the best thing about this place.
Better hurry off to the dining hall... I don't want the food to get cold.
Is that the dinner bell or my tummy growling? Hard to tell.
